website_summaries.verdict: Versatility and features designed for comfort make this office chair worth the investment despite a few concerns.
pros: Stands out when it comes to adjustability, as the arms, seat, head rests, and lumbar support can be situated for a customized seating experience
Not overly difficult to put together
cons: Head and arm rests are prone to becoming loose and squeaking
Support of the cushioning may decrease with regular use

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy, very please with the chair.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my husband, who works from home, as a Christmas gift. My office chair that my corporate purchased was something similar but I think it’s way more expensive than this one. I was amazed by the quality of this chair. It’s very easy to install, the instructions is very clear and easy to understand. It come with all the needed tools and even a pair of glove to keep your hand clean, very thoughtful. Husband spent about half an hour to install and he loves it. It’s very sturdy and comfortable. Wheels are smooth; leaning back, hight and the head support adjustment are very easy to make. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: hydog

customer_reviews.title: Really a Ergonomic chair
customer_reviews.text: It is a really good chair and it worth that price. It is designed all round shape. Hardly find any sharp angles on it. Fabric covered seats with mesh net back makes it comfortable and there's no hard feeling after long sit. Metal bottom with 5 special designed wheels make it static and sturdy. Back angle and height could be adjusted and the feeling like a recliner. Even the head rest could be adjust as height and angle. I have to mention it has a wide seat and the whole feeling is like I'm sitting on a back seat of an Range Rover. This one is really good and I like it very much.
customer_reviews.author: Yuki ukulele

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable for me 5.4" and husband 6.3
customer_reviews.text: Head support is great. Moving, rotating around is very smooth. The leg rest can be horizontal or tilted lazy boy chair style
customer_reviews.author: linh

customer_reviews.title: Terrific chair
customer_reviews.text: I've been a fan of chairs with built-in footrests like this since I discovered them. The headrest on my last one broke, and sadly I couldn't replace the headrest, so I had to replace the chair. This one is a bit more expensive, but you can feel it in the quality of the construction. So far I love it. And it has armrests with adjustable heights, which is an oddly rare (and very helpful) feature for this type of chair. If you're looking for a mesh style desk chair with a built-in footrest, this is absolutely the best one I've found on the market.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan

customer_reviews.title: Good chair unless you are tall.
customer_reviews.text: This is a well built office chair. It's sturdy and has many points of adjustment. I do have a few complaints with it, though. I'm 6'2" and even with the arm rests at maximum height they are too short. This causes me to have shoulder strain over time. The head rest also can't really be adjusted forward very well, only height and angle. If you are of short or average height, I'm sure this would be a good fit for you
customer_reviews.author: Ian

customer_reviews.title: long wait time for delivery
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this chair on 21 Jul with an expected delivery of 4-12 August. The available 'tracking' is a simple notification that it's shipped, and the estimated delivery. I'm already a bit perturbed (before I've even gotten the chair) that the price seems to have gone down $30 since I ordered it! Long wait for delivery and I guess I should have waited myself a bit longer.
customer_reviews.author: T. Pyles

customer_reviews.title: DANGER! Back of the chair will snap and injure your back.
customer_reviews.text: The plastic connection for the back support snapped while reclining, injuring my back. Made of cheap plastic and can be potentially dangerous.
customer_reviews.author: dave j

customer_reviews.title: NOT Functional, Cheaply Made: Over Price Point $99 at best
customer_reviews.text: Don't wast your money on this Office chair. On videos look good but the functions are useless cause they don't hold after the adjusted. 1)the head rest is sloppily loose, 2)till tension function: tighten the adjustment knob either way; no heip, 3)up/down gas lift started to fail after few month; aprox few week gas lift fail to hold after height adjust. Once sat on slowly drop to lowest point. ..4)............5)............... The wrost failure is the gass lift. After that main function goes the whole office chair need to
customer_reviews.author: omarfist

customer_reviews.title: This is one of the best chairs you can buy for the price
customer_reviews.text: Once the pandemic hit and I was forced to work from home, I did a lot of research on office chairs. I have some slight back problems, so getting the right chair was important. After ordering a chair that didn't work, I settled on this one due to its adjustable lumbar support and arm rests. I'm glad I made the choice! The chair is very supportive, has a great set of incline options, and the adjustments work well. It feels very well built after two months of use. If I have issues, I'll update the review, but right now I would say it would be tough to get better bang for your buck if you cannot afford a $500-$1,000 chair.
customer_reviews.author: JLight

customer_reviews.title: A little bit disappointed
customer_reviews.text: This is not a bad chair. I bought it based on others' reviews as I work from home most of the time. It was not difficult to assemble as long as you read the instructions carefully and also read the comments regarding the arm rests in the reviews. The assembly did take 45 minutes. The chair does help me keep good posture, however, as someone else stated, it could use more padding. I do find the seat somewhat uncomfortable and may get a cushion for it.
customer_reviews.author: Parttimer

customer_reviews.title: Good chair for this price
customer_reviews.text: Pros: - Neatly packaged - Easy to install (other reviews said otherwise, not sure if they assembled other chairs before to see the difference) - Gloves included - Chair feels good/comfy Cons: - lubricant on screws(they did provide the gloves though; and the screws should last longer with lubricant so maybe this is another pro) - side rests are a bit wobbly when lifted high(i'll update review if they break) - small gas lift compared to my previous chairs(it works for me at 6 foot, but they could have included a longer one if you prefer to have your feet suspended while using the chair)
customer_reviews.author: KlaudiuX

customer_reviews.title: Great, but...
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this chair for the past 1 month and it started making weird noise when you move or adjust the seating position. Here are the pros and cons. Pros: 1. Comfortable 2. Easy to assemble Cons: 1. There is no way to horizontally adjust the armrest so you are stuck in one position 2. The noise makes it unusable for office or public space
customer_reviews.author: BNB

customer_reviews.title: cylinder failed after 4 months
customer_reviews.text: Chair is not bad but getting ahold of the company for warranty is a BIG JOKE. I emailed SIHOO and have yet to hear back. Since I am outside my return time with Amazon I have to contact them directly but they're not in the US so it's been a waiting game and I don't expect to ever hear back. I just want a new cylinder or my money back but it most likely won't happen. I don't plan to buy from SIHOO again since they don't contact you back.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING!
customer_reviews.text: Between my husband doing his classes and me at home business we desperately needed an upgrade for our office chair! I cannot even describe how much I love this thing! It’s so comfortable, it’s easy to clean, and it’s very easily adjusted if needed! The head rest tilts back and forth and up and down depending on your height, the entire seat moves up and down, the lumbar support goes in and out with just a twist of a knob, the mesh keeps you cool when you’re sitting in it for long periods, and besides your typical spinning around, it rocks back and forth! It is so well made and ridiculously comfortable! We LOVE this chair!!!
customer_reviews.author: SchoepFam11

customer_reviews.title: It's sturdy and easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: I haven't tried all sorts of chairs, especially in this pandemic. Thus, I don't know if the price is reasonable or not, comparing to other "available" alternatives. However, it's been a month that I'm using this sturdy chair. I like its head support. The back support could be designed better. The assembly was easy and they had put gloves in the box. So far, I'm happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Ram

customer_reviews.title: One of the best chair we have tried.
customer_reviews.text: One of the best chair we have tried so far. This is a chair use in the office to replace the older one. What we like the most of this chair is the adjustable parts on the back from head to waist that really help on the long work for different people. The metal stand is also a plus comparing more of others are in black plastic material. Beside the installation is easy and quick. Overall, it is good for this price range, under $200 with shipping included.
customer_reviews.author: GO3D

customer_reviews.title: Best chair, so comfortable but supportive
customer_reviews.text: The chair came way faster than expected. Very easy to assemble. Great quality. Everything is adjustable. I very certain I'm going to have this chair for many years. Updating my review just to say this is now my favorite place to sit. I find myself going into my office when I'm not working just to sit in this chair. It's so comfortable. Feels like it was made just for me and it will fillmlike that for anyone since it's totally adjustable. Im so thankful to find such an awesome chair without a crazy high cost. The base is actually metal, not plastic.
customer_reviews.author: SilentB

customer_reviews.title: Overall good chair
customer_reviews.text: Overall good product. Have to work from home as the coronavirus spreads, but can not afford the top brands that cost hundreds of dollars. While searching for chairs with head support, this one falls into the budget. Overall it is good, I mean, within this price range. I really miss my chair at work which is way more comfortable than this one. If you get 1k, go for the top brand, you get what you paid for. Pros: price is affordable, did the job, wheel is smooth cons: the lumber support is a bit hard and pushing forward too much. Add one star for Amz return policy and shipping speed for missing part.
customer_reviews.author: Frank

customer_reviews.title: Good quality chair, nice seller
customer_reviews.text: The office chair is fantastic. It is easy to assemble and very comfortable. The adjustable back support is very useful with different time when I need to adjust it to the position I prefer. Apart from the quality of the chair, what really impressed me is some details in packing. A plastic clip was attached on the box so that I can use the clip to open the box. Also a pair of white gloves in the box so that I could put on the gloves while assembling the chair. Never have a chance to have such a kind seller thinking so much for us customers.
customer_reviews.author: yeldon

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for my office. I have terrible posture and wanted a chair with lots of options. This chair is perfect. Very comfortable and can adjust arms, back, headrest. etc. The lumbar support is great. So happy I got it. I did have my nephew assemble it for me and it took no time at all. My only regret is I don't have two of them. He assembled it late in the day and I sat in it while watching TV in the living room. That really was great but I needed it for my office. The wheels work well too. Really glad I got this chair.
customer_reviews.author: N. Ross

customer_reviews.title: Second time buyer
customer_reviews.text: This the second time I purchase this chair. I bought it for home last year. I really love it. This time I am looking for new chair in my workshop. I decide to make another purchase. I'm cellphone repair technician. I need to sitting all day long to finish my work. With this chair I feel less fatigue and sore on my back. I also notice some improvement for installation. It makes easier to assemble than last one. Happy to see that.
customer_reviews.author: Ben.Z

customer_reviews.title: Very Satisfied
customer_reviews.text: I was pleasantly surprised when I opened the box. Everything is about one step higher in quality than I was expecting. The seat is very firm out of the box. Arm-rests are nice, with a bit of give and a contour for your arms. Lumbar support and headrest both have a bit of padding, which isn't really made clear in the pictures. It's no $1k office chair, but it's very good for the money. For reference, I had a $120 chair from Staples for the past 3 years and this chair absolutely is on another level.
customer_reviews.author: D. Drumm

customer_reviews.title: Long term comfort over immediate satisfaction
customer_reviews.text: This chair is fantastic - after plenty of searching, this seemed to be the best item for its value if shopping around the $200 mark. While it does not seem to be the most comfortable chair in the world from first sitting, it is actually designed to provide comfort over a long period of time. It is not lush leather, but it is great for keeping your neck and spine supported while working or gaming. It has a full range of adjustability (not slots or levels) so you can lean back and change the headrest to your preferred position. It also has customizable lumbar support which is extremely helpful for mitigating those lower back problems. Do not pass up!
customer_reviews.author: Mortenson Scharf

customer_reviews.title: My first office chair and it is great.
customer_reviews.text: I was very worried about assembling an office chair for my home office because I had never assembled one before. I wore the provided gloves and followed the instructions. It was really easy even with me putting one part backwards. It was an easy fix and the chair is really comfortable. The chair provides a lot of support and I can adjust the head and arm supports. The arm rest are soft and not hard like other office chair and I appreciate that. I am very happy with my purchase so far. I am really happy. I will add to this review about how I feel in a month or so.
customer_reviews.author: Albert Wong

customer_reviews.title: Just the chair I needed!
customer_reviews.text: This is a quality chair . Excellent material and workmanship. Short assembly time (30 minutes). Exactly what I was looking for in an orthopedic type chair. The chair fits my spine closely and gives plenty of lumbar support (adjustable). I often sit for hours in front of a computer and this chair removes much of the physical stress. The chair was well packaged and arrived without damage. I would buy this chair again.
customer_reviews.author: Bill C

customer_reviews.title: Chair failed over time
customer_reviews.text: Got this chair for my office. Initially thought it was well built, and overall it was comfortable. Over time things started to fail though -- initially an arm rest fell off and would never go on again properly. Then most recently the hydraulic lift failed. I then discovered that the lift unit is welded together so can't be replaced. Just the same I disassembled the unit to see if there was any way to repair, there wasn't. In fact the lift itself has bits of rubber that had apparently disintegrated throughout. All said the chair became useless, for which it was discarded. Apparently longevity is not something that manufacturers considered.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality
customer_reviews.text: I wasn't sure about these offline, I usually prefer to buy such items directly from the store so I can make sure it is exactly what I'm looking for. However I took a chance on this and I'm glad I did. They are for a coffee table project I plan on working on and since this table will be used for puzzles and games I wanted to make sure the wheels on it would be strong enough to support us leaning on the table. Its well made and seems to be very durable. The wheels are a "soft" rubber material, perfect for wood floors.
customer_reviews.author: NikitaSmith01

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: I am a 5’10”, 210lbs man, and this chair fits pretty well! It is comfortable! It’s very adjustable. Materials seem to he pretty good, The base is aluminum alloy I believe. I think I could fall asleep in this chair because it reclines quite a bit. Assembly was simple and only took 20 minutes. Instructions were clear. The shipping took a little longer than anticipated as it came to me from TN from CA. I messaged the seller who responded quickly and resolved the issue, going over amd above my expectations!
customer_reviews.author: JonesAK

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase
customer_reviews.text: Since I have to work at home due to the COVID-19. I really need a comfortable chair to protect my injured lumber spine. After doing some searching and read reviews I selected this ergonomic chair. In the first the instructions were very easy to follow. I am a very poor manual worker but I only took 30 minutes done by myself. And the lumber is adjustable which was the most important part for me. The thick metal base is also great! Overall I am satisfied with my purchase!
customer_reviews.author: avon

customer_reviews.title: Extremely Sturdy Home office Chair
customer_reviews.text: I often wonder why are these chairs, typically over $200, so expensive? I understood it after receiving this one. It is extremely sturdy and well-built. This is not just some plastic. It has a very stable foundation that is made of 100% metal, so you know that it will be stable and last for a long time. It doesn't necessarily have 5+ knobs to adjust every part of the chair but it has enough flexibility to get things done. I have another chair with so-call full adjustability but I still like this much better, simple and sturdy. It also makes the installation much easier. Ideal for personal/home office during this pandemic period.
customer_reviews.author: Eric Zhou

customer_reviews.title: So far so good
customer_reviews.text: I desperately needed a good office chair and after researching the style apporperate for the type of computer work I do I decided on this one. The assembly went well (although the back support screws' hex insert stripped almost imidiately when tork was applied to it) and I got it together in under an hour. The feel so far Hass been good and I now look forward to sitting at my desk for extended periods of time. Hopefully this review doesn't change in the coming weeks/months as I did see a few reviews about pieces breaking.
customer_reviews.author: The Barnes-

customer_reviews.title: good support and easily movable
customer_reviews.text: Before purchasing this ergonomic chair, i already owned a gaming chair which is heavier and leathern. Comparing these two chairs for some days, i would say i made a right decision to change my chair. This new chair is actually more supportive to spine and neck because of its relatively firm base. Though the delivery package is very heavy, but when finish assembling, I surprisedly find the chair is relatively light and easy to move even on the rug. That is almost where it defeats my old chair. Though they are both pricey for me, i’d say this purchase give me more satisfaction, especially when i have to sit for a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Penguin

customer_reviews.title: Overall, a good product
customer_reviews.text: After using this chair for a few months, I can say it is pretty comfortable and relieved the back problems I had with my prior chair. Assembly was surprisingly easy. I only wish that the seat would be adjustable to extend forward a little. I have long legs, and could use a little more support for them. So if you are tall, this chair might not be for you. The listing in Amazon says warranty data is available at their website, but it was not to be found. So I emailed the company and they provided some info. I'm just a little skeptical dealing with a product from China.
customer_reviews.author: Robert S.

customer_reviews.title: Definitely a must buy —Awesome 5 star chair
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been looking for an office chair for about a year. I’m so glad I purchased this one. Came with all the pieces I needed including extra pieces and a box opener. fantastic, clear directions, awesome for someone who isn’t great at putting stuff together. Took me about 30 min to put together without cuss words. Lol. I just had surgery so can’t sit for long periods of time but this is very comfortable and easy to sit at. Absolutely love it and really want to save up to buy another one for my son. My only regret- I didn’t find this chair sooner. It’s fantastic
customer_reviews.author: Walnutgal

customer_reviews.title: Recommend to use for office and very comfortable chair.
customer_reviews.text: This is high quality office chair. Easy to assemble and only take 10mins. There has one button that can adjust the wrist part to support wrist. And the head part can adjust high or low where assemble. The arm part can adjust too. Very comfortable for use and the material of chair is very good and ventilate. Only one part I hope can be better that the head part can not adjust by one button. If different high people use the same chair cannot adjust.
customer_reviews.author: Miya

customer_reviews.title: the one I have been looking for
customer_reviews.text: Since the covid-19 pandemic started,I had to work from home from April this year. I work at home for almost 6-7 hours a day. A few days ago, I just threw away the office chair that I had used for 4 years, and then I was looking for a comfortable office chair. This chair is the one I have been looking for. This chair is very simple to install. I followed the instructions and installed it in about half an hour. Its back fits my back exactly, and the headrest is flexible and can be adjusted according to people of different heights.
customer_reviews.author: David Sears

customer_reviews.title: So nice
customer_reviews.text: Love this chair with the adjustable head rest that other office chair doesn’t have. The lumbar support is great for my lower back when I have to sit for 10 hours for work. Love the mess back that allows for air flow between my back and chair. Like the fact that the wheels are quiet when moving the chair. Also it is make really sturdy unless others with lower grade plastic that cracks overtime. Very easy to assembly out of the box. Will definitely recommend to my family members and friends.
customer_reviews.author: Erica

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality Poor product suppot
customer_reviews.text: I have low back issues and spend half of the workday at a desk. Less than 4 months in the seat back falls back as soon as I sit down, The adjust control stopped working. I left message with vendor....NO RESPONSE,,,,STAY AWAY! Unfortunately I'm out $200.00 and now shopping for another chair. FOLLOW UP: Almost one year later 4/21/2020 a response from the vendor. We will give you $30 gift card to remove your review.....STAY AWAY!! Look elsewhere, I have never had such a poor product and worse customer service. A full credit at this point would be nice but I'm not holding my breath!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Troost

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money....stick with Office Depot
customer_reviews.text: Buyer beware... chair is not worth the money...it doesn't come with height adjustment and the extra that your are paying for the leg rest is a joke.. it doesn't fully extend out. If I can give a zero I would. I normally take heed to reviews, but the good ones outweighed the bad ones, which was so true.
customer_reviews.author: Diamond

customer_reviews.title: Not just a chair. A comfortable one
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assembling. Instruction very straightforward and helpful. I got it done in 15 mins. My daughter had a old small chair and I’ve been shopping while for chair and I’m glad I got this. Materials are high quality and comfortable. All parts fits another. The tilt just amazingly comfortable. Also u can lock into the angle that u wanted. Headrest unlike other fit to adjust according to your height. She has been using for week and she loves it
customer_reviews.author: AMY C.

customer_reviews.title: Good I
customer_reviews.text: The chair is very comfortable. My back is doing much better in this new chair. I wish it was a bit easier to adjust the recline feature.
customer_reviews.author: Dnc226

customer_reviews.title: Impressed! But left with just one assembly question?
customer_reviews.text: Comes with tools, extra hardware and linen gloves to keep your hands and the chair clean. Nicely packaged and well made. Metal wheel base for durability. 2 sets of casters for carpet or floors. Easy assembly with just one question. Left and right arm pads are marked but are universal so can be installed either side. Higher edge side goes towards or away from the chair? Very comfortable and adjustable but haven't sat in it working for hours yet.
customer_reviews.author: Redned

customer_reviews.title: Office Chair!!
customer_reviews.text: Because of Covid-19, l have to work from home so I decided to get a good chair for myself. This office chair is an ergonomic one that have lumbar support and headrest. More important thing about this chair is you can adjust the headrest, lumbar support and the height according to your body, which can reduce neck and back pain if you sit and work there for at least 8 hours a day, gives you better sitting experience and let you feel comfortable sitting in it.
customer_reviews.author: Tina

customer_reviews.title: Super comfortable chairs
customer_reviews.text: Bought it for my home office chair and I am pleased with the purchase, hope that it can last a long time! Pros: Easy to assemble only takes about 20 mins, tools are included with a pair of white grove. Breathable and really had a good ergonomic feel to it. Vibrant Color, Rich Looking, Excellent Quality, High Quality of Material, Sturdy, Perfect Size, Good Size & Weight, Functional, Well Made, Lots of Features, Comfortable, Nice Design.
customer_reviews.author: Jasmine CNY

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Gaming/Streaming Chair
customer_reviews.text: I use this as my new daily, (8+ hours a day) great build quality and comfort, Don't have to worry about sweating in this, breaths good with the mesh back and fabric bottom. I will never go back to those overpriced fake leather chairs, and I have had my fair share of them. If you need a new chair for gaming or working at home, go ahead and buy this, really nice chair, it don't get any better than this, coming from someone who has owned 14+ chairs in 10 years.
customer_reviews.author: mazztu

customer_reviews.title: Much better than my previous chair
customer_reviews.text: My first chair is extremely uncomfortable. So I spent 50 bucks on the second chair bought from eBay. However, it has a really poor quality. So I made up my mind to buy a solid chair. Although this chair is a little bit expensive. But it is amazingly comfortable and has the solid made. Most of the parts are made of steel. And it is very easy to assemble. Highly recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: MikeShi

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Chair
customer_reviews.text: I did a lot of research trying to find the best chair at the lowest price for my craft area. I love this chair. The price was excellent. I have a very similar chair at my place of employment that very expensive and I can't tell the difference. I am so glad that I ordered this chair. I wouldn't hesitate to purchase this same chair again.
customer_reviews.author: abby

customer_reviews.title: solid chair for home office
customer_reviews.text: It's a all around well made chair with attention to details. The seat cushion looks durable and legs are made of aluminum instead of plastic which is unusually good. In addition to the tilt, up and down, the lumbar support can also be adjusted two ways. The only thing need to pay attention to is that if you are a big person, make sure to install the back further back away from the seat cushion, so you will have more depth. And the armrests can be installed the same way away from the seat cushion for more width.
customer_reviews.author: Wayne

customer_reviews.title: Not good!
customer_reviews.text: I use chairs all the time, this one lasted 3 months then it got malfunction on the recliner, then I got a replacement, then the seat was not lifting anymore after a month, unfortunately not worth it, waste of time!
customer_reviews.author: Andre PG

customer_reviews.title: I like it
customer_reviews.text: I love this office chair, comfortable and affordable. The style is what I love the most, adjustable headrests and armrests is a plus. Adjustable height, very thick armrests cushions make it very comfortable to rest my arms while working for long hours. The seat is wide enough where I can sit on it for long period of time. And when I’m tired I can just rest my head and can easily fall asleep. I definitely recommended this chair to friends and might buy one more for my other room.
customer_reviews.author: Jirong

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and affordable
customer_reviews.text: This chair was easy to put together and a huge upgrade from my Ikea plastic chair. The lumbar support is just enough for my needs, and the headrest makes working for long periods even more comfortable. This is the first "nice" office chair I've owned, so I don't have much to compare to, but if you are looking for an affordable, comfortable, ergonomic chair, I can't recommend this enough! It took about 30 minutes to assemble.
customer_reviews.author: Simone

customer_reviews.title: Great Customer Support
customer_reviews.text: I believe one of the greatest assets a company can have and/or showcase is the non-tangible aspect--having an exceptional customer service/support. I believe when a company produces a great product, they will stand behind it 100%. Great customer service means helping customers (like myself) in a such an efficient manner that it exceeds customers (my) expectations. For one, they showcased a speedy response time. In addition, the customer support rep has been exceedingly respectful and has shown that they are willing to go the extra mile to help out a customer in need. They have certainly made me one extremely happy customer, and this will certainly help promote their brand. Thanks again! You guys are great! -Michael
customer_reviews.author: Michael Yi

customer_reviews.title: Sihoo stands behind its product!
customer_reviews.text: Sihoo ergonomics office chair was ordered, received in record time and assembled with ease. I did have a problem with raising and lowering the seat. Sihoo kept information flowing until a replacement part was received and installed. The chair works perfectly thanks to their follow-up. I look forward to using this ergonomics office chair for many years as it is quite comfortable with the many adjustments that can be made.
customer_reviews.author: Annie Cell

customer_reviews.title: Decent but not great
customer_reviews.text: It's an okay chair, but it has a few issues that detract. The two main things are that it squeaks a LOT. I might be able to oil some parts to quieten that. The second is the headrest is very loose and flops around all over the place. I actually had to jam a wooden wedge into one spot to try to hold it steady. If I had to do it over again, I would buy something else.
customer_reviews.author: High-Tech Redneck

customer_reviews.title: great office chair
customer_reviews.text: My old office chair was getting old and I didn't get very good support of back. Did some research on amazon and found this amazing office chair. I do like the design a lot and I think this will make a different difference especially when it's getting hot. This chair definitely has good air circulation. It does support my back and my neck very well. I do live it and I am hoping it will last.
customer_reviews.author: L Green

customer_reviews.title: Decent at this price point, but seller doesn't seem to be honoring warranty.
customer_reviews.text: In general, a good chair at this price point. Easy to assemble and adjustable. However, the sellers have been unresponsive to a warranty email. I emailed a week ago to discuss a cracked backrest, and haven't yet received a reply. I feel like I probably should have gone for a brand that is more responsive to customers.
customer_reviews.author: BR

customer_reviews.title: Amazing office chair!!!! Super supportive and comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing office chair!!!! Super supportive and comfortable! Has great back and lumbar support! Nice large armrests! The chair itself is bigger than most so comfortable for people of any size! Adjustable headrest and back can lean back which is nice! Has had lift for moving seat up and down easily! Nice premium alloy legs and casters to move around easily while sitting down! Amazing chair at an amazing price!! Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: krystle stolleis

customer_reviews.title: Good chair
customer_reviews.text: I like this office chair. It is comfortable and i can even adjust the head piece which is good since i am short and my head would not otherwise fit correctly. I also like the way the chair is made since it is not too hot to sit on in the summer. I would definitely buy this chair again since it is very comfortable and I like the way it looks as well.
customer_reviews.author: Christina

customer_reviews.title: Easy and Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: This chair was simple to assemble and now it works very well. The armrests and headrest are placed in a way for easy relaxation and the inclination of the chair is very easy to adjust and move around. The chair won't take much space and can be recline to around120 degree angle. Have been using it for months, easy and comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: JD.W

customer_reviews.title: Fits my needs and body nicely.
customer_reviews.text: Took about twenty minutes to assemble. Instructions are clear, the chair also comes with a pair of white gloves and a wrench. The chair is well built, sturdy, wheels are smooth. The seat pad is a little firm with good support. Adjustable back, arm and head support makes me feel comfortable after long time remote working. And I don’t worry about a sweaty back anymore seating on the breathable mesh material. I like the chair a lot!
customer_reviews.author: Sam

customer_reviews.title: Does not last long
customer_reviews.text: I have had my chair since January. For the past week, the chair no longer supports my weight (no I haven't gained weight). After about 5 minutes, I slowly sink. Very distracting. Today, the back support no longer stays vertical, even after adjusting the back support bar. I tried to call the numbers listed on the website - both numbers disconnected.
customer_reviews.author: Joel and Christine Williams

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable all day
customer_reviews.text: This chair comes with white gloves. Literally. It has been an amazing transition from a regular deal chair. You can adjust the headrest, lumbar support, arms and footrest early. It is sturdy and has extra little touches like the casters for the wheels are great quality. It rolls quietly on tile and is comfortable to sit in all day. You can use for work or lean back and read a book. I bought it to use for work and my husband likes to sit back and relax in it. So glad I did my research. This chair was the best choice!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Mae Marvitz

customer_reviews.title: Great mesh chair for working at home
customer_reviews.text: This chair is absolutely ergonomic and comfortable. Delivered a few days ahead of schedule. Great materials and great quality. It was easy to assemble and easy to adjust as needed. Love the mesh material which makes it breathable and avoids overheating after sitting for a long period of time. It also provides excellent back and neck support which is great for people with back pain issues like me. The chair is not cheap but totally worth the money. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: heidi shi

customer_reviews.title: This New Chair
customer_reviews.text: This is just what I expected. Cheap crap from China. It works but I sure wouldn't let anyone over 240 lbs sit on it. The thing would smash like an aluminum can. I think you will find this of any of the "gaming" chairs. All crap from the zipper heads. There are NO instructions included with the chair. You will need to count the screw holes to "match up" the bolt associated with the part being installed. Good Luck and ching chong
customer_reviews.author: Big Al

customer_reviews.title: Seat positioning broke in 5 days after purchase
customer_reviews.text: We have bought this chair, the chair itself is very comfortable and really helps for people with back issues. But quality, the seat recliner broke in 5 days after purchase. Trying to exchange to new one or return. Not sure about customer service yet, will update my post based on how my issue will Be handled by seller. P.s 3 days later update on customer service. Nobody answered, numerous times contacted seller. Total ignore. They don’t give an option of return or exchange, will try to file a claim through amazon..
customer_reviews.author: Stas Budagov

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable chair
customer_reviews.text: The chair is packaged and equipped with installation tools. Each type of screw has an extra spare. The manufacturer is more thoughtful. The installation instructions are easy to use. I followed the instructions and installed it within 15 minutes. The base is steel, very heavy, and strong. The backrest of the chair can be freely converted between three angles. The wheels move very smoothly and the sound is very low. My husband loves it, which is very important for him working at home.
customer_reviews.author: jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Great chair & customer service
customer_reviews.text: Shipment was delayed. When I contacted the seller fot status, they were excellent about resolving the issue. They gave me clear and reasonabe options and followed through as agreed. The chair was easy to assemble. Having so many adjustable components makes it perfect for different body types. it's really comfy! The headrest is a great design, and the extra support has eased my neck pain. The ajustable lumber support is nice because the position of the lumbar support can be moved higher or lower on the back and in addition to adjusting it to the desired stiffness. This chair and the company selling it exceeded my expectIons.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany C.

customer_reviews.title: The best office chair I ever have
customer_reviews.text: This is the best office chair I ever have. I use it for work and leisure time. Support on lumbar, neck, and armrest, are all adjustable for personalized ergonomic comfort. The whole back of the chair can be adjustably tilted for a rest, a nap, and movie time. The material quality and design are good. The back support material is wind-through, so that your back feels much comfortable in the summer. I recommend this office chair to buyers.
customer_reviews.author: HAILUN YU

customer_reviews.title: Nice Chair, and you can stick a Bluetooth speaker on it
customer_reviews.text: Over all a high quality and a comfortable chair. The wheel legs are polished stainless steel. The backrest are mesh and stay cools. Features include adjustable lumbar support, reclined backrest with lock and etc. My favorite part is you can stick a Bluetooth speaker between the headrest and the backrest, so you can game on speaker without worrying about your sound annoys your roommate. A big plus for me.
customer_reviews.author: Franco Novikoff

customer_reviews.title: Overall it’s a really nice chair like I said if it reclines a little bit more It would be better.
customer_reviews.text: I find that the chair is very comfortable the mechanical part of it is pretty smooth but only thing I think it could’ve reclined a little more other than that it’s an excellent year I would’ve given it a five star if reclined a little more works very well you could sit in front of the TV It’s very comfortable people come over you can use it as an extra chair not just a desk chair that’s a pretty awesome share
customer_reviews.author: Michael A Ferraro

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy. The hydraulic lift is garbage.
customer_reviews.text: I would not recommend this chair. It's reasonably comfortable but the hydraulic cylinder constantly sinks down all the time over and over again. All day I'm having to stand up and bring the chair to the top position again. It's super annoying and it's been doing this since day 1. I'm going to attempt to buy a better lift cylinder and replace it but this is ridiculous.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Greer

customer_reviews.title: This chair is a bummer
customer_reviews.text: Don't buy it. It's a bummer to put something together and then not really have a manageable way to return it. - Really stiff seat cushion - Absolutely unusable without a pillow. - Lower part of the chair that is supposed to be the lumbar support just feels like a bar sticking in my back. Actively looking for additional padding.
customer_reviews.author: CVPlum

customer_reviews.title: Nice Chair! Worth the price!
customer_reviews.text: It is really nice chair, comfortable and sturdy. It only takes me 10 mins to put it together. And we think it looks even better /nicer than other $500+ chairs. Ergonomic design is great, the back, the arm, the seat height are all adjustable. I have decided to get rid of my old chairs after I got this one. Very nice chair.
customer_reviews.author: PJ Louis

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable chair that is worth it
customer_reviews.text: Set up was okay. It would have been nice if I had another pair of hands at times, but the instructions fit on one page and were pretty easy to follow. I'm a petite person, so I think the chair supports me pretty well and doesn't tip back too much. The arm rests, chair height, and head rest are adjustable. It's pretty comfortable and has made sitting all day for work not as bad.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Tara Lee

customer_reviews.title: Back rest not locking into place
customer_reviews.text: I like everything about the chair, it is supportive, easy to assemble, and looks great. There is a major problem though, the seatback will not lock into an upright position, with any amount of weight leaning back it will make a "pop" and lean all the way back. I tried to contact the seller, they messaged me saying they will help, and then I have heard nothing. I can return the item per amazon, but that is no easy task to ship back an entire chair without the original box.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Higgs

customer_reviews.title: Very Comfortable Chair!
customer_reviews.text: I received this chair one week ago. Based on the installation instruction, it was very easy to be done the set-up of it. I have used it for almost one week, and I felt very comfortable when I sat on it. The design of the chair back could release my waist pain, and neck rest, especially adjust of armrest could relax my body completely after my hardworking all day long. It is an amazing chair. I love it so much.
customer_reviews.author: Juan Dou

customer_reviews.title: Great chair.
customer_reviews.text: first, if you looking for a luxury leather chair, then this is not the pick for you. This is a great office chair with a neck support and back support pcs. It was easy to put together, spent about 25 mins to assemble all 4 big parts. i even checked parts detail, well made parts. right height adjustable, holds my weight well. I was having back problems since working from home and sitting in an inadequate chair for 7+ hours per day, but this has helped tremendously!
customer_reviews.author: Mifibunny

customer_reviews.title: Value for your money
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for something comfortable, supportive and adjustable that would not be overwhelming for a home office. It's definitely what I've been looking for. This chair is lightweight and easy to move around. Adjust height up and down. Fixed position arm rests. Cushion is pretty good. I had already recommended a friend to purchase It. It is value for your money
customer_reviews.author: Delgermaa

customer_reviews.title: Worth the price and time of waiting
customer_reviews.text: Due to the COVID, it took longer to arrive, but the item itself is a quality and legit product as described. I searched over Amazon, the most of similar products are about 40 to 50 dollars more than this one. I am sitting on it and writing the review now. Very comfortable to my back.
customer_reviews.author: Tristan

customer_reviews.title: A chair I never had before
customer_reviews.text: This chair is very very good and comfortable when i working on the computer i can easily change the Height of the chair so i can sit with the best position and when i need relax i can use the key on the side of the chair and unlock it then the chair will become a couch is a really good chair to buy for use working in front of a computer or in the office
customer_reviews.author: Cheyanne

customer_reviews.title: Good quality easy assembly great design
customer_reviews.text: Super easy to assembly, probably less than 15 minutes. Firm and sturdy. I do not like some chairs that loose their firmness shortly. This one looks can last long. The back part is high which can hold my head when I am tired. Generally, satisfied for the price and quality! i would like to recommend to all my friend.
customer_reviews.author: Jim Ya

customer_reviews.title: As advertised
customer_reviews.text: This product has got to be the best ergonomic chair I ever owned or ever used in my work environment. Easy to assemble. The lumbar support is worth the money alone. The foot rest is a outstanding when taking a break and watching a movie. The head rest is the final accent to all the ergonomic features. I would recommend this product to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: dnalor

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality Chair. Recommended!!!
customer_reviews.text: Pros - adjustable arm rest, head rest, lumbar support, seat height - reclinable - light weight - stylish - easy to assemble - even comes with a pair of gloves for installation Cons - plastic parts seem low value - can't think of anything else; it's a good buy
customer_reviews.author: Ling T.

customer_reviews.title: chair looks good and feels comfortable.
customer_reviews.text: The chair was easy to assemble, not tools required. The tools came with the chair. It was easy to assemble with easy to follow instructions and every part was labeled. The chair feels sturdy and comfortable. The seat cushion is firm but not hard. The back rest tension is adjustable so you can lean back without the feeling of you falling or too hard that the back rest pushes back. The head rest is also adjustable or remove. Overall the chair looks good and feels comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Miles

customer_reviews.title: Compares favorably with chairs costing twice as much
customer_reviews.text: At one of my clients I am fortunate enough that the provide the top-end Steelcase chairs. Working from home occasionally I needed something with the same type of support and ability to be adjusted. Was more than pleased to find this chair that has all the right options, and came with detailed and very easy to follow instructions. If you want a chair for under $500, this is probably the one to consider.
customer_reviews.author: Ewan Grantham

customer_reviews.title: Good company, kinda mediocre chair
customer_reviews.text: The chair itself is passable for the price, and the included headrest/adjustable lumbar support is very nice. However my main problem is with the leg rest. It is very small, and I find myself having to place a pillow on it to make up for how small the cushion is. The product arrived late, but they compensated me $54 for the late arrival time, very generous of them. Recommend if you're on a budget
customer_reviews.author: soutpansa

customer_reviews.title: Great Office Chair
customer_reviews.text: This ergonomic office chair is perfect. It is reasonably priced. It was actually surprisingly easy to assemble. The head support on it which can be adjusted up and down and back and forth feels comfortable. Along with the head support there are many other parts of the chair that are adjustable. The chair’s back area has a mesh feel to it, so you can sit there for hours and feel no pain. Overall, this office chair is really well made in my opinion.
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: Hurt to sit in without cutting our lumbar
customer_reviews.text: It’s solidly made with decent materials. Does not feel cheap. But. No matter what I did I could not get the lumbar support to stop digging painfully into my back. The armrests are also too moulded so that if your arms are at an angle they dig into you. I waited too long to send it back but once I cut off the lumbar support and bought new armrests I’m much happier.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Supportive but very stiff seat.
customer_reviews.text: My wife works from home and we purchased this chair to be her every day desk chair. The overall build of the chair is sturdy and easy to assemble. Additionally the chair was received quickly after shipping. The chair is quite supportive and has many easy to adjust options for the headrest, lumbar support, and arm rests. The only drawback for the chair is that the seat is quite stiff. My wife is a relatively small person (5'2 and approx. 120 lbs) and finds that the seat is too stiff for her weight and had to order a seat cushion so her bottom didn't hurt at the end of the day.
customer_reviews.author: Cory Padilla

customer_reviews.title: Great for long session gaming
customer_reviews.text: I wanted a comfortable gaming chair that doesn't scream "gamer," so at first, I really liked the Stables mesh office chair but it was too expansive. That's why I started to look at alternatives that looked like that and I came upon this. I was pleasantly surprised by this chair, it is easy to assemble, and it feels great. The mesh is cool on my back so I don't sweat like on a leather chair. I could adjust the lumbar support and the headrest so that it fits posture. Of course, the chair can also lean back pretty far and be raised or lowered. Gaming while sitting a whole afternoon on this chair does not fatigue me in the slightest.
customer_reviews.author: Eric

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: This chair is very heavy and of good quality. I installed it according to the instructions. It is simple and easy to understand, and the installation is completed in very little time. The cushions, pillows, and cushions are very comfortable, and the waist and neck feel comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Terrible chair.....be aware
customer_reviews.text: I work out of my home and this chair is undeniably the worst chair I've ever used. The lift/rise mechanism does not work. The lumbar support is terrible and the chair just feels flimsy and cheap. Definitely not worth $200. I could get a comparable chair from Office Depot for $79. Have asked the seller for help and have not heard from them. Not only has this confirmed I will not buy from this seller, but no other furniture purchases from Amazon. The service after the sale is the worst I've ever seen.
customer_reviews.author: William Walton

customer_reviews.title: mediocre chair
customer_reviews.text: this is a crappy chair for 250 usd, i don't know why there are so many good reviews about it. its huge, way too tall, obviously some generic chair rebranded, and not comfortable at all. its also impossible to disassemble when you put it together, so forget returns. the arms are not 3D, the back support is stiff and protruding way too much.
customer_reviews.author: stiff

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I had this chair for about 15 years and the wheels don't swing as easily as it used to. So I end up scrapping the floor and difficult to move around. I got these new wheels because of the reviews and they turned out much bigger than my original wheels. My chair is super smooth now and can swing freely in any direction. The wheel feels good quality and is similar to what you would find in a scooter. Love them!
customer_reviews.author: Dennis

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality, super comfortable
customer_reviews.text: This chair is stylish and very comfortable. The cushion is firm and supportive. The back is breathable and ergonomically designed. The headrest is high enough to rest my head on it and comfortably see the computer screen. I can sit in it for hours without feeling any discomfort. Also, it was quite easy to assemble with clear instructions. This is a great chair for the quality and I highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Wang

customer_reviews.title: Excellent chair
customer_reviews.text: I've had several office chairs including some more expensive "ergonomic" ones. This chair so far has been an excellent chair in every way. The back could sit forward a little more to help me sit 'straight up', I would also like if the arm rests were more easily removable with a button release. It is an excellent chair, very comfortable, good cushioning, leans far back when I want it to, I will likely buy another one for my wife's desk as she likes the chair too. We'll see how it stands the test of repeated use over time.
customer_reviews.author: Zach B.

customer_reviews.title: A really nice chair if you're not too tall
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this chair based on the features and reviews, and see why everyone likes it. I ended up having to arrange a refund because I'm too tall and end up sitting uncomfortably forward on the seat. The seller was great to work with on the refund, so no complaints at all.
customer_reviews.author: S. Douglas

customer_reviews.title: Solid chair that I’m glad I purchased.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this chair for my home office after researching many chairs in the $250 or less price range. The chair was easy to assemble and appears to be well made and sturdy. I’m 5’ 10” and weigh 175lbs and this chair is very comfortable with adequate seat cushioning, adjustable arm and head rests, and lumbar support. The chairs tilts backward allowing me to periodically lean back and use the headrest to relax my neck and back. I have zero complaints about the chair and I’ve had many that were uncomfortable in one way or another in the past. We are now buying the same chair for my spouse.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen T. DeLay

customer_reviews.title: Perfect home office chair
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful chair! It is amazing design and very easy to assemble, took me about half hour to put everything together. Height can be easily adjusting up and down to your own liking. I love this new office hair, absolutely comfortable and greatly adjusts my poor posture from sitting hours in front of the computer. It also has good support for back, neck and shoulder, the head piece can be removed for personal preference. This chair is excellent and exactly what I need for my home office set-up. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: QXG

customer_reviews.title: Cost performance
customer_reviews.text: A cost-effective chair, tangled for a long time, finally in the store to buy this! The assembly is also relatively simple. It will be finished in a few minutes! The friend also said must anticipate is good! I really like it! I have to mention that the management of the store is very responsible, I like the responsible store very much, and the after-sales attitude is also very good, and I still need to choose your home in the future!
customer_reviews.author: ekko

product_meta.title: Sihoo Ergonomics Office Chair Computer Chair Desk Chair, Adjustable Headrests Chair Backrest and Armrest's Mesh Chair (Black)
feature_bullets: ★【Features】Two-way adjustable lumbar pillow and headrest allow for complete fine-tuning of support based on personal preferences, 90°-125°degree reclining backrest adjustable for multiple work positions, 10cm (3.9 in.) of seat pad vertical adjustment and 360°-degree swivel capability. Ultra-soft cotton cushion is comfortable and resists sagging and sinking.

★ 【Ergonomic Design】Recognized by the Ergonomics Application Association for providing ergonomic designs based on extensive research conducted with digital models of the human body. The angles of the backrest and human spine have been designed for a perfect match. The results are a well-fitting chair that helps to dramatically release spinal pressure. The lower seating pad includes thigh support for long periods of use.

★ 【Premium Materials】For the backrest, we’ve incorporated a specially-selected mesh cloth with high tensile strength and breathability properties. For mobility, thickened PU rubber castors roll and glide smoothly across the floor and won't scrape or scratch flooring surfaces.

★ 【Research】SIHOO is the realization of decades of research conducted by professionals in the human body and physiology, product design, and mechanical engineering. We do our absolute best to make sure the smallest details are designed with comfort and safety for each customer. Every aspect of our chairs has been assessed with strict safety and quality testing, including but not limited to cushion impact tests, handrail fatigue tests, and chair-frame static pressure tests, to ensure high quality

★ 【Warranty】Product warranty period is one year. If there are any quality problems, please contact us. After confirming, we will provide a replacement part or product for you. SIHOO provides full parts coverage for the three years of the warranty period, at zero cost for you!
